definition.text: If you didn't mess up the command, you should be seeing a new page with the title you set, an invitation to write a summary, and more below!

paragraphs.text: If you are getting an error message, read it and fix the problem! It's likely about the syntax in the command. Remember you may always go back a step to recover the original command!
Right-click and select the pencil icon to edit.
To exit edit mode, hit the Escape key.
To add new paragraphs, edit the last one, click Enter and keep writing. See what happens when you exit!
To change styles, right-click and explore the menu!
